titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Malcomson, Higginbotham and Palmer photograph collection.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Malcomson, Higginbotham and Palmer photograph collection.

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: The architectural firm of Malcomson and Higginbotham was founded in Detroit, Mich., in 1890. The firm went through several name changes and was known as Malcomson, Higginbotham and Palmer from 1920 to 1924.
archdesc.scopecontent: Collection of photographs of school buildings designed by the firm Malcomson, Higginbotham and Palmer, including exterior and interior views, and a few photos of classrooms being used by students. Schools represented include George W. Balch School, Levi L. Barbour Intermediate School, and Southwestern High School in Detroit and Durant and Civic Park Schools and Flint High School, Flint, Mich.
